alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Juab... southeastern Box Elder...western Salt Lake...southwestern Davis... southwestern Utah and eastern Tooele Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to 15 miles southeast of Vernon. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, Tooele, Grantsville, West Jordan, Eagle Mountain, Stansbury Park, Cedar Fort, Vernon, Ophir, Delle, Tooele Army Depot, Tooele Army Depot South, Skull Valley, Bingham Canyon Mine, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Elberta, Magna, Camp Williams, Eureka and Stockton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 69 and 108. US Route 6 between mile markers 125 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
